name: Stunt Craft - Blocky Racing
description:
Get into gear… and do it fast!

Get ready for crazy cars, loopings, raw speed and explosions in this racing game

If it is your destiny to become a reckless driver you have come to the right place. Blocky cars, crazy tracks and exhilarating stunts define this over-the-top racer. Enjoy death defying jumps, extreme loopings and avoid the obstacles on the track. There is fame and glory on the horizon, but how long can you survive?

This free mobile racing game is all about a quest for thrills and making death defying stunts. Release your inner dragon and powerboost through amazing looping with a press of the thumb. Chase bus jumping records and drift through three exciting levels. Will you become the best drifter in the universe?

Key Features
+ Create your own stunt show and perform your tricks and furious racing style on this heroic universal tour
+ Easy to play one touch controls but difficult to master
+ Cool retro graphics and colorful car design
+ Three unique and challenging levels
+ Jump over ever growing rows of busses and avoid the TNT explosives to land safely on the tarmac
+ Earn many vehicles and unlock special rides, each with their own special perks and abilities (Sedan, Humvee, Tractor and sports cars)
+ Realistic, but funny rag doll / puppet physics
+ Hunt down five challenging achievements and compete with your buddies on the world leaderboards to become + Lord stunt racer and claim your everlasting legacy
+ Master all the courses to receive special club medals and perks
+ No dusty simulator, but real time arcade fun!

Tracks:

Blocky Boulevard
This paradise level is beautiful but deadly. Here you will be given the bus jumping challenges as well as other wooden construction obstacles that are littered on the highway. Knowing when to use the throttle or your handbrake is key here. Don't die between the busy traffic on the high streets as you pass cinemas, clubs and other interesting vistas in this beautifully designed level

Take-Off
Go loop the loop in this mad level full of corkscrews and sick making loopings and enjoy a perfectly made circle when you time your overdrive powers correctly. Make sure to go for all those perfect pick-ups!

Beach Assault
This secret base is home to many extreme US military vehicles, fighter planes and death defying ramps that will let you gasp for air. Can you turbo boost through the signposts, collect the big coins and make a happy landing?
